Text: I am running win 7 -64 bit, with Raedon 5770, and i5.  When i run the exe file (either baconing.exe or skidrow.exe) my pc completely freezes. (black screen) Any thoughts?

My screen goes totally black everytime I try to load the game and then I have to hit the reset button. Anyone having the same problem or anyone who can help out?
